## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# Build Folders (bin, obj)
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Rider IDE files
.idea/

# VS Code files
.vscode/

# Auto-generated files
Generated_Code/

# Backup & temporary files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
packages/
**/packages/*
!**/packages/build/
!**/packages/repositories.config

# .NET Core files
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Others
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# Visual Studio 2019/2022
.vs/
